# RStudio Projects

There are many good reasons to organize your work in projects. You can read a more thorough discussion the advantages of organzing work as project [in this Software Carpentry Module](https://swcarpentry.github.io/r-novice-gapminder/02-project-intro/index.html). I'm not qualified to talk about all the magnificant ways that RStudio Projects will change your lives, I'm only really qualified to discuss why I find them advantageous:
